public ref class DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection sealed : System::Collections::DictionaryBase

summary.span: 表示 XML Web 服務探索期間所探索且已下載至用戶端的文件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of documents discovered during XML Web services discovery that have been downloaded to the client.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的型別。The property of is of type . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會制定 XML Web 服務探索，並將探索到的文件下載至用戶端。The following code example enacts XML Web service discovery and downloads the discovered documents to the client. 探索文件內的名稱會輸出到主控台。The names of the discovery documents within the are output to the console.
